name: Design Agent Evaluation
description: Tests the design agent's ability to generate both code and prompt-based designs.

parts.text: {"type": "code", "code": {"css": "linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(46,204,113,0.25), rgba(52,152,219,0.25))", "svg": "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1280' height='720'><defs><pattern id='grid' width='40' height='40' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><path d='M 40 0 L 0 0 0 40' fill='none' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.08)' stroke-width='1'/></pattern></defs><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='url(#grid)' /></svg>"}, "prompt": null}
{"type": "prompt", "code": null, "prompt": "Abstract dark background with subtle, deep blue and purple gradients. Professional, minimalist, and designed for high text legibility. No text or logos."}
